author: barrettj
msg: Replace usage of ConcurrentHashMap with a collection that can be externally locked for update to prevent ConcurrentModificationExceptions.  The ConcurrentHashMap degraded performance by over 5% in some scenarios.

author: stack
msg: Improved exception message suggested by feti up on IRC

author: sebb
msg: Allow If Controller to use variable expressions (not just Javascript)

author: faridz
msg: * src/locale_body.h: Revert changes, accidentally committed in r703124.
